
I don’t know how many phases are in there


*** SOLID SOLUTIONS ***

>> OLIVINE	OLIVINEi 
FAYALITE	FORSTERITE
fayalite	forsterite
4		4

>> CARBONATE	CCDO
CALCITE		MAGNESITE	DOLOMITE
calcite2 	magnesite2	dolomite2
6		6		6

>> FELDSPAR	FSP
ALBITE		ANORTHITE	KFELDSPAR
high-albite	anorthiteC1	sanidine
8		8		8

>> ILMENITE	ILM
ILMENITE	ILMENITE	HEMATITE
Oilmenite	Dilmenite	hematite
3		3		3


>> EPIDOTE		EPI
ZOISITE		EPIDOTE
clinozoisite		Fe-epidote 
13			13

>> GARNET	GARNET

12		12		12		12
